channel.title: Fight cave area doesn't load properly
channel.description:
I tried to convert fight caves from zenith to matrix. I though it would work but when I go in it looks like this: [img]http://i.imgur.com/yEMJe9m.png[/img]
I also tried to load those chunk coordinates to cutscene, map looked similar. So are those coordinates wrong somehow or why it doesn't load properly?

item.title: Fight cave area doesn't load properly
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Region updating and your cache. Make sure everything in the cache was converted correctly.

Read full topic
item.source: Fight cave area doesn't load properly

item.title: Fight cave area doesn't load properly
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:507918”][quote author=zeropointx link=topic=626154.msg4259311#msg4259311 date=1363297321]
I tried to convert fight caves from zenith to matrix. I though it would work but when I go in it looks like this:

I also tried to load those chunk coordinates to cutscene, map looked similar. So are those coordinates wrong somehow or why it doesn’t load properly?
[/quote]

Isn’t this to do with map loading?[/quote]
Well any other minigames work fine and cutscenes as well… There has to be something in region or elsewhere that fixes that in matrix.

Read full topic
item.source: Fight cave area doesn't load properly
